result.eng: The hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ga: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.orig: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.html: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ an halla i ndiaiḋ Naoṁ PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.

result.ga: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig
result.orig: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig
result.html: An dtig liom labhairt le PádraigMay I speak to Patrick?
result.ponchtml: An dtig liom laḃairt le PádraigMay I speak to Patrick?

result.html: Scríobh Pádraig graiméar GaeilgePatrick wrote an Irish grammar.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ Pádraig graiméar GaeilgePatrick wrote an Irish grammar.

result.eng: Good-bye, Patrick, I have to go.
result.ga: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeacht
result.orig: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeacht
result.html: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeachtGood-bye, Patrick, I have to go.
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Ṗádraig caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċtGood-bye, Patrick, I have to go.
